dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.party.Language
dataStructure.description:
Represents a spoken and/or written language.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Language

child.name: alphabetName
child.description:
The alphabet name use for the language

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: alphabetName

child.name: dialectNames
child.description:
A list of the dialects of the language

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dialectNames

child.name: geographicLocationName
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association GeoLocationName_SpecifiedUsingLanguage

This association end is optional
child.label: geographicLocationName
